html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-10882003-07-24,  ,  PCO,  , 
ActPublic Service Staff Relations Act
PrecisAppointment of SYLVIE MATTEAU of Hudson, Quebec, to be a Deputy Chairperson of the Public Service Staff Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of three years; and orders that she shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective September 2, 2003.
AttachmentsAttachment
